g1901.definition: [ἐπεκτείνομαι] middle voice from {{g1909}} and {{g1614}}; to stretch (oneself) forward upon

g1902.definition: [ἐπενδύομαι] middle voice from {{g1909}} and {{g1746}}; to invest upon oneself

g1903.definition: [ἐπενδύτης] from {{g1902}}; a wrapper, i.e. outer garment

g1904.definition: [ἐπέρχομαι] from {{g1909}} and {{g2064}}; to supervene, i.e. arrive, occur, impend, attack, (figuratively) influence

g1905.definition: [ἐπερωτάω] from {{g1909}} and {{g2065}}; to ask for, i.e. inquire, seek

g1907.definition: [ἐπέχω] from {{g1909}} and {{g2192}}; to hold upon, i.e. (by implication) to retain; (by extension) to detain; (with implication, of {{g3563}}) to pay attention to

g1908.definition: [ἐπηρεάζω] from a comparative of {{g1909}} and (probably) ἀρειά (threats); to insult, slander

g1909.definition: [ἐπί] a primary preposition; properly, meaning superimposition (of time, place, order, etc.), as a relation of distribution (with the genitive case), i.e. over, upon, etc.; of rest (with the dative case) at, on, etc.; of direction (with the accusative case) towards, upon, etc. In compounds it retains essentially the same import, at, upon, etc. (literally or figuratively).

g1910.definition: [ἐπιβαίνω] from {{g1909}} and the base of {{g939}}; to walk upon, i.e. mount, ascend, embark, arrive

g1911.definition: [ἐπιβάλλω] from {{g1909}} and {{g906}}; to throw upon (literal or figurative, transitive or reflexive; usually with more or less force); specially (with {{g1438}} implied) to reflect; impersonally, to belong to

g1912.definition: [ἐπιβαρέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g916}}; to be heavy upon, i.e. (pecuniarily) to be expensive to; figuratively, to be severe towards

g1913.definition: [ἐπιβιβάζω] from {{g1909}} and a reduplicated derivative of the base of {{g939}} (compare {{g307}}); to cause to mount (an animal)

g1914.definition: [ἐπιβλέπω] from {{g1909}} and {{g991}}; to gaze at (with favor, pity or partiality)

g1917.definition: [ἐπιβουλή] from a presumed compound of {{g1909}} and {{g1014}}; a plan against someone, i.e. a plot

g1918.definition: [ἐπιγαμβρεύω] from {{g1909}} and a derivative of {{g1062}}; to form affinity with, i.e. (specially) in a levirate way

g1920.definition: [ἐπιγίνομαι] from {{g1909}} and {{g1096}}; to arrive upon, i.e. spring up (as a wind)

g1921.definition: [ἐπιγινώσκω] from {{g1909}} and {{g1097}}; to know upon some mark, i.e. recognize; by implication, to become fully acquainted with, to acknowledge

g1922.definition: [ἐπίγνωσις] from {{g1921}}; recognition, i.e. (by implication) full discernment, acknowledgement

g1924.definition: [ἐπιγράφω] from {{g1909}} and {{g1125}}; to inscribe (physically or mentally)

g1925.definition: [ἐπιδείκνυμι] from {{g1909}} and {{g1166}}; to exhibit (physically or mentally)

g1926.definition: [ἐπιδέχομαι] from {{g1909}} and {{g1209}}; to admit (as a guest or (figuratively) teacher)

g1927.definition: [ἐπιδημέω] from a compound of {{g1909}} and {{g1218}}; to make oneself at home, i.e. (by extension) to reside (in a foreign country)

g1928.definition: [ἐπιδιατάσσομαι] middle voice from {{g1909}} and {{g1299}}; to appoint besides, i.e. supplement (as a codicil)

g1929.definition: [ἐπιδίδωμι] from {{g1909}} and {{g1325}}; to give over (by hand or surrender)

g1930.definition: [ἐπιδιορθόω] from {{g1909}} and a derivative of {{g3717}}; to straighten further, i.e. (figuratively) arrange additionally

g1931.definition: [ἐπιδύω] from {{g1909}} and {{g1416}}; to set fully (as the sun)

g1932.definition: [ἐπιείκεια] from {{g1933}}; suitableness, i.e. (by implication) equity, mildness

g1933.definition: [ἐπιεικής] from {{g1909}} and {{g1503}}; appropriate, i.e. (by implication) mild

g1934.definition: [ἐπιζητέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g2212}}; to search (inquire) for; intensively, to demand, to crave

g1937.definition: [ἐπιθυμέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g2372}}; to set the heart upon, i.e. long for (rightfully or otherwise)

g1939.definition: [ἐπιθυμία] from {{g1937}}; a longing (especially for what is forbidden)

g1941.definition: [ἐπικαλέομαι] middle voice from {{g1909}} and {{g2564}}; to entitle; by implication, to invoke (for aid, worship, testimony, decision, etc.)

g1943.definition: [ἐπικαλύπτω] from {{g1909}} and {{g2572}}; to conceal, i.e. (figuratively) forgive

g1944.definition: [ἐπικατάρατος] from {{g1909}} and a derivative of {{g2672}}; imprecated, i.e. execrable

g1945.definition: [ἐπίκειμαι] from {{g1909}} and {{g2749}}; to rest upon (literally or figuratively)

g1946.definition: [Ἐπικούρειος] from Ἐπίκουρος (compare {{g1947}}) (a noted philosopher); an Epicurean or follower of Epicurus

g1947.definition: [ἐπικουρία] from a compound of {{g1909}} and a (prolonged) form of the base of {{g2877}} (in the sense of servant); assistance

g1949.definition: [ἐπιλαμβάνομαι] middle voice from {{g1909}} and {{g2983}}; to seize (for help, injury, attainment, or any other purpose; literally or figuratively)

g1950.definition: [ἐπιλανθάνομαι] middle voice from {{g1909}} and {{g2990}}; to lose out of mind; by implication, to neglect

g1951.definition: [ἐπιλέγομαι] middle voice from {{g1909}} and {{g3004}}; to surname, select

g1952.definition: [ἐπιλείπω] from {{g1909}} and {{g3007}}; to leave upon, i.e. (figuratively) to be insufficient for

g1954.definition: [ἐπίλοιπος] from {{g1909}} and {{g3062}}; left over, i.e. remaining

g1956.definition: [ἐπιλύω] from {{g1909}} and {{g3089}}; to solve further, i.e. (figuratively) to explain, decide

g1957.definition: [ἐπιμαρτυρέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g3140}}; to attest further, i.e. corroborate

g1959.definition: [ἐπιμελέομαι] middle voice from {{g1909}} and the same as {{g3199}}; to care for (physically or otherwise)

g1960.definition: [ἐπιμελῶς] adverb from a derivative of {{g1959}}; carefully

g1961.definition: [ἐπιμένω] from {{g1909}} and {{g3306}}; to stay over, i.e. remain (figuratively, persevere)

g1962.definition: [ἐπινεύω] from {{g1909}} and {{g3506}}; to nod at, i.e. (by implication) to assent

g1963.definition: [ἐπίνοια] from {{g1909}} and {{g3563}}; attention of the mind, i.e. (by implication) purpose

g1965.definition: [ἐπίορκος] from {{g1909}} and {{g3727}}; on oath, i.e. (falsely) a forswearer

g1966.definition: [ἐπιοῦσα] feminine singular participle of a comparative of {{g1909}} and εἶμι (to go); supervening, i.e. ({{g2250}} or {{g3571}} being expressed or implied) the ensuing day or night

g1967.definition: [ἐπιούσιος] perhaps from the same as {{g1966}}; tomorrow's; but more probably from {{g1909}} and a derivative of the present participle feminine of {{g1510}}; for subsistence, i.e. needful

g1968.definition: [ἐπιπίπτω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4098}}; to embrace (with affection) or seize (with more or less violence; literally or figuratively)

g1969.definition: [ἐπιπλήσσω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4141}}; to chastise, i.e. (with words) to upbraid

g1970.definition: [ἐπιπνίγω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4155}}; to throttle upon, i.e. (figuratively) overgrow

g1971.definition: [ἐπιποθέω] from {{g1909}} and potheo (to yearn); to dote upon, i.e. intensely crave possession (lawfully or wrongfully)

g1973.definition: [ἐπιπόθητος] from {{g1909}} and a derivative of the latter part of {{g1971}}; yearned upon, i.e. greatly loved

g1975.definition: [ἐπιπορεύομαι] from {{g1909}} and {{g4198}}; to journey further, i.e. travel on (reach)

g1976.definition: [ἐπιῤῥάπτω] from {{g1909}} and the base of {{g4476}}; to stitch upon, i.e. fasten with the needle

g1977.definition: [ἐπιῤῥίπτω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4496}}; to throw upon (literally or figuratively)

g1978.definition: [ἐπίσημος] from {{g1909}} and some form of the base of {{g4591}}; remarkable, i.e. (figuratively) eminent

g1979.definition: [ἐπισιτισμός] from a compound of {{g1909}} and a derivative of {{g4621}}; a provisioning, i.e. (concretely) food

g1980.definition: [ἐπισκέπτομαι] middle voice from {{g1909}} and the base of {{g4649}}; to inspect, i.e. (by implication) to select; by extension, to go to see, relieve

g1981.definition: [ἐπισκηνόω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4637}}; to tent upon, i.e. (figuratively) abide with

g1982.definition: [ἐπισκιάζω] from {{g1909}} and a derivative of {{g4639}}; to cast a shade upon, i.e. (by analogy) to envelop in a haze of brilliancy; figuratively, to invest with preternatural influence

g1983.definition: [ἐπισκοπέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4648}}; to oversee; by implication, to beware

g1984.definition: [ἐπισκοπή] from {{g1980}}; inspection (for relief); by implication, superintendence; specially, the Christian "episcopate"

g1985.definition: [ἐπίσκοπος] from {{g1909}} and {{g4649}} (in the sense of {{g1983}}); a superintendent, i.e. Christian officer in genitive case charge of a (or the) church (literally or figuratively)

g1986.definition: [ἐπισπάομαι] from {{g1909}} and {{g4685}}; to draw over, i.e. (with {{g203}} implied) efface the mark of circumcision (by recovering with the foreskin)

g1987.definition: [ἐπίσταμαι] apparently a middle voice of {{g2186}} (with {{g3563}} implied); to put the mind upon, i.e. comprehend, or be acquainted with

g1988.definition: [ἐπιστάτης] from {{g1909}} and a presumed derivative of {{g2476}}; an appointee over, i.e. commander (teacher)

g1989.definition: [ἐπιστέλλω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4724}}; to enjoin (by writing), i.e. (genitive case) to communicate by letter (for any purpose)

g1991.definition: [ἐπιστηρίζω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4741}}; to support further, i.e. reestablish

g1993.definition: [ἐπιστομίζω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4750}}; to put something over the mouth, i.e. (figuratively) to silence

g1994.definition: [ἐπιστρέφω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4762}}; to revert (literally, figuratively or morally)

g1996.definition: [ἐπισυνάγω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4863}}; to collect upon the same place

g1997.definition: [ἐπισυναγωγή] from {{g1996}}; a complete collection; especially a Christian meeting (for worship)

g1998.definition: [ἐπισυντρέχω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4936}}; to hasten together upon one place (or a particular occasion)

g1999.definition: [ἐπισύστασις] from the middle voice of a compound of {{g1909}} and {{g4921}}; a conspiracy, i.e. concourse (riotous or friendly)

g2000.definition: [ἐπισφαλής] from a compound of {{g1909}} and σφάλλω (to trip); figuratively, insecure
